story_arceus_07_12000/2401_1001_0200_10:
All right! As promised, let’s get this training
started! Come at me with all you’ve got!
story_arceus_07_12000/2401_1001_0300_10:
It’s OK if you can’t beat me now, but don’t
you dare give up!
story_arceus_07_12000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Trust me—you all have to get stronger
than me!
story_arceus_07_12000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Each and every one of you is the main
character of your own story. And you’re
gonna save the world!
